wikipedia_page.main: Colin McGrath MLA (born 21 October 1975) is an Irish Social Democratic and Labour Party (SDLP) politician from Northern Ireland. He has been a Member of the Northern Ireland Assembly for South Down since the 2016 election.

response: * Colin McGrath, South Down SDLP MLA, Chairman and Chief Whip was born and lives in the town.
She has been selected to run for the SDLP in the 2022 Northern Ireland Assembly election in South Down alongside Colin McGrath.
